name: part_011
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】The First Note【 #⁠音乃瀬奏生誕祭2025 】#hololiveDEV_IS #ReGLOSS [mt8AyISL9Ig]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_011.mov

scenes.description: MC section. Kanade talks to the audience, takes a water break, and introduces her original song "GREATEST".

subtitles.original: Beautiful
subtitles.english: Beautiful

subtitles.original: 見上げても どん詰まりで 君道をゆけ
subtitles.english: Even if you look up and see a dead end, go your own way

subtitles.original: 私でいい
subtitles.english: I'm fine as I am

subtitles.original: 私の歩幅で 生きていくのさ
subtitles.english: I'll live at my own pace

subtitles.original: 誰かとを比べるのは 避けられない心情
subtitles.english: Comparing yourself to others is an unavoidable feeling

subtitles.original: 誰かとを許すのは 難しい心情
subtitles.english: Forgiving someone is a difficult feeling

subtitles.original: ないもの探せば 数え切れないけれど
subtitles.english: If I look for what I don't have, they are countless

subtitles.original: ゆっくり愛してみよう 私というこの命を
subtitles.english: Let's try to love slowly, this life called me

subtitles.original: 世界で一つの 輝く光になれ
subtitles.english: Become the one and only shining light in the world

subtitles.original: 明かりのない 明日を迎えたとしても
subtitles.english: Even if I face a tomorrow without light

subtitles.original: 悲しみの先に 孤独が押し寄せても
subtitles.english: Even if loneliness rushes in beyond sadness

subtitles.original: 息をしている 今日も息をして生きている
subtitles.english: I'm breathing; today, too, I'm breathing and living

subtitles.original: 世界で一つの
subtitles.english: The one and only

subtitles.original: 私に幸あれ
subtitles.english: May I be blessed

subtitles.original: 涙に幸あれ
subtitles.english: May tears be blessed

subtitles.original: 明日に幸あれ
subtitles.english: May tomorrow be blessed

subtitles.original: 世界で一つの 輝く光になれ
subtitles.english: Become the one and only shining light in the world

subtitles.original: 泣いてもいい 私を歩いてゆくのさ
subtitles.english: It's okay to cry; I will walk as myself

subtitles.original: 涙は頬 流れる星のようさ
subtitles.english: Tears are like shooting stars flowing down my cheeks

subtitles.original: 私になれ 私を叶えて生きていくのさ
subtitles.english: Become me; fulfill myself and live on

subtitles.original: いつの日も...
subtitles.english: Always...

subtitles.original: はい！ということで
subtitles.english: Yes! So,

subtitles.original: いかがでしたでしょうか。
subtitles.english: how was that?

subtitles.original: ちょっとお水だけ飲んできます！
subtitles.english: I'm just going to go drink some water!

subtitles.original: さぁ、この響き曲の余韻が消えぬ間に、
subtitles.english: Now, while the resonance of this song still lingers,

subtitles.original: 最後の曲聴いてください。
subtitles.english: please listen to the last song.

subtitles.original: GREATEST！
subtitles.english: GREATEST!

subtitles.original: 目を開けて 口ずさむ 輝ける
subtitles.english: Open your eyes, hum along, you can shine

subtitles.original: きっと無敵になる
subtitles.english: You'll surely become invincible

subtitles.original: Feel my heart
subtitles.english: Feel my heart

subtitles.original: GREATEST
subtitles.english: GREATEST

subtitles.original: See me become the GREATEST
subtitles.english: See me become the GREATEST

subtitles.original: No one can beat me
subtitles.english: No one can beat me

subtitles.original: Cuz I'm a GREATEST
subtitles.english: Cuz I'm a GREATEST

subtitles.original: 固く結び直した靴紐が 羽に見えて
subtitles.english: The shoelaces I retied tightly look like wings

subtitles.original: どこまででも飛べる 予感がする
subtitles.english: I have a feeling I can fly anywhere

subtitles.original: 追いかけるなんて 趣味じゃない
subtitles.english: Chasing isn't my style

subtitles.original: 追い越そう 明日だって
subtitles.english: Let's overtake, even tomorrow

subtitles.original: 夢のまま終わるほど 眠くないわ
subtitles.english: I'm not sleepy enough to let it end as a dream
